featureType.name: arctic_rds_crossover_errors
featureType.title: rds_crossover_errors
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: rds_crossover_errors
virtualTable.sql: WITH cx1 AS (SELECT pp1.location_id,cx.point_path_1_id,cx.id, cx.geom, lp.layer_id, lp.twtt, pp1.geom AS pp1_geom FROM rds_crossovers cx JOIN rds_point_paths pp1 ON cx.point_path_1_id=pp1.id JOIN rds_segments seg ON pp1.segment_id=seg.id JOIN rds_seasons ss1 ON pp1.season_id=ss1.id LEFT JOIN rds_layer_points lp ON cx.point_path_1_id=lp.point_path_id AND lp.layer_id = %layer_id% WHERE ss1.name IN (%season_name%) AND ss1.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND seg.name > %start_seg% AND seg.name < %stop_seg%), cx2 AS (SELECT cx.point_path_2_id, cx.id, lp.layer_id, lp.twtt, pp2.geom AS pp2_geom FROM rds_crossovers cx JOIN rds_point_paths pp2 ON cx.point_path_2_id=pp2.id JOIN rds_segments seg ON pp2.segment_id=seg.id JOIN rds_seasons ss2 ON pp2.season_id=ss2.id LEFT JOIN rds_layer_points lp ON cx.point_path_2_id=lp.point_path_id AND lp.layer_id=%layer_id% WHERE ss2.name IN (%season_name%) AND ss2.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND seg.name > %start_seg% AND seg.name < %stop_seg%) SELECT cx1.geom, CASE WHEN COALESCE(cx1.layer_id,cx2.layer_id) = 1 THEN ABS((ST_Z(cx1.pp1_geom) - cx1.twtt*299792458.0003452/2) - (ST_Z(cx2.pp2_geom) - cx2.twtt*299792458.0003452/2)) ELSE ABS((ST_Z(cx1.pp1_geom) - (SELECT twtt FROM rds_layer_points WHERE layer_id=1 AND point_path_id = cx1.point_path_1_id)*299792458.0003452/2 - (cx1.twtt - (SELECT twtt FROM rds_layer_points WHERE layer_id = 1 AND point_path_id = cx1.point_path_1_id))*299792458.0003452/2/sqrt(3.15)) - (ST_Z(cx2.pp2_geom) - (SELECT twtt FROM rds_layer_points WHERE layer_id=1 AND point_path_id = cx2.point_path_2_id)*299792458.0003452/2 - (cx2.twtt - (SELECT twtt FROM rds_layer_points WHERE layer_id = 1 AND point_path_id = cx2.point_path_2_id))*299792458.0003452/2/sqrt(3.15))) END AS error FROM cx1 JOIN cx2 ON cx1.id=cx2.id AND (cx1.layer_id=cx2.layer_id OR (cx1.layer_id IS NULL OR cx2.layer_id IS NULL)) WHERE cx1.location_id = %location_id%
